name: Bubbles Escape
description: Bubbles Escape is a Metroidvania style platformer designed by Team Neir in Unity. Team Neir is a team comprised of 6 designers and 3 artists over the course of four months for our final project for Full Sail University. Players will encounter a Metroid style world where they use powerups they find around the underground labs as they work their way out of the area 51 bunkers. With 3 different types of weapons, 5 enemies types, and 3 bosses. Their are many possibilities but the one goal is to escape from the bunkers alive.
